casebody.data:
No. 87,

Orig.

California v. Texas.

Motion of Citizens for a Better Environment et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of plaintiffs to defer consideration denied. The temporary restraining order entered March 9, 1981 [ante, p. 977], is vacated. Motion for leave to file a bill of complaint denied without prejudice. [For earlier order herein, see, e. g., ante, p. 1027.]
